content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: POOLID
      operator: non_empty
    - name: USUBJID
      operator: non_empty
Core:
  Id: CORE-000230
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Verify that when POOLID is populated, USUBJID is not populated
Outcome:
  Message: USUBJID must be null when POOLID is populated
  Output Variables:
    - POOLID
    - USUBJID
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Variable
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0362
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Either USUBJID or POOILD must be populated.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: USUBJID
                Section: RELSUB
              - Cited Guidance: Either USUBJID or POOILD must be populated.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: POOLID
                Section: RELSUB
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - RELSUB

json.Description: Verify that when POOLID is populated, USUBJID is not populated

Outcome.Message: USUBJID must be null when POOLID is populated

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Either USUBJID or POOILD must be populated.
Either USUBJID or POOILD must be populated.
